Doctor.title: Doctor
Doctor.description: Represents a doctor in the campus hospital.

status.description: The current status of the doctor (e.g., Available, On Break, Busy).

SosReport.title: SOS Report
SosReport.description: Represents an emergency SOS report sent by a user.

FeedbackLog.title: Feedback Log
FeedbackLog.description: A log entry for user-submitted feedback for various campus services.

type.description: The service the feedback is for.

rating.description: The star rating provided by the user (1-5).

photoUrl.description: Optional URL to an image uploaded by the user (e.g., for cafeteria food).

timestamp.description: The server timestamp when the feedback was submitted.

status.description: The current status of the feedback.

/doctors/{doctorId}.description: Stores real-time information about each doctor, including their availability status and specialty.

/sos-reports/{reportId}.description: Stores all emergency SOS reports submitted by users.

/feedback_logs/{logId}.description: Collects all user-submitted feedback for services like the cafeteria and hospital.
